nodes.excerpt: Hi Product Hunt! I'm Dmitriy, the maker of Noizer. I would love to introduce you to my small project - Noizer. An app, where you can listen to ambient sounds. It's inspired by Noisli project, but 100% free.

NEW:

An elite New York City hospital has been charging $3,000+ for COVID tests at a site it runs through an emergency room.

One family ended up charged $39,000 for 12 tests, all taken for return to work and school purposes.
